item.title: Jeff Probst on the evolution of "Survivor" as it enters season 48
item.description: Jeff Probst discussed how "Survivor" has evolved over 48 seasons and what changes have kept the show fresh.

item.title: 7 planets are aligning in the night sky for a "planetary parade"
item.description: Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune and Uranus could be visible, but not all can be seen by the naked eye.

item.title: Changes at the U.S.-Mexico border under Trump's new immigration policies
item.description: New data shows a dramatic drop in illegal border crossings as the Trump administration touts new changes at the U.S.-Mexico border. CBS News' Camilo M...

item.title: Apple shareholders reject proposal to scrap DEI program
item.description: Apple credits its DEI program as helping make the iPhone maker the most valuable company in the world.

item.title: New consumer confidence index data drops sharply
